text: [Music]
hi Jeff bar here at eight Agustin
Seattle and our three launch
announcements for this week are pretty
diverse
we've got Amazon Elastic search service
Amazon light sale with Windows and gluon
first let's look at our Amazon Elastic
search service where you can now easily
set up access from your Amazon virtual
private cloud without having to
configure and maintain firewall rules
and IP based access policies for each
domain this means that all traffic
between your ec2 instances are lambda
functions and your elastic search
clusters stays within your V PC and on
the AWS network
next up Amazon Lite sell customers can
launch pre-configured Windows instances
with a few clicks and directly connect
to them via RDP you can also track
metrics create snapshots and manage DNS
records and static IP s associated with
your Windows instances finally perhaps
our biggest news this week aw said
Microsoft announced a new deep learning
library called gluon this open source
software allows you to prototype build
train and deploy sophisticated machine
learning models for the cloud devices at
the edge and mobile apps with gluon
developers can build machine learning
models using a simple Python API and a
range of pre-built neural network
components I expect this collaboration
and simplify the implementation of
machine learning making it accessible to
developers that don't have specialized
skills it's been a big week in cloud
computing for the full slate of recent
launches check out the what's new page
and thanks for watching
[Music]
